## Forest Soil Gene Catalogue



- [Reference gene catalog](http://www.zju.edu.cn) (fasta, 100M)
: Sequences of the *** gene non-redundant gene catalog.
- [De-nove assembled contigs](http://www.zju.edu.cn) (fasta)
: The contig sequences from which the gene set originated.
- [Count matrix of the reference gene catalog](http://www.zju.edu.cn) (csv)
: A * genes v.s. 45 samples seqeunce-read count-matrix.
- [PFAM annotation of the gene catalog](http://www.zju.edu.cn) (csv)
: a reference table linking PFAM IDs to the contig IDs
- [KEGG annotation of the gene catalog](http://www.zju.edu.cn) (csv)
: a reference table linking KO IDs to the contig IDs
- [Uniprot annotation of the gene catalog](http://www.zju.edu.cn) (csv)
: a reference table linking Uniprot IDs and GO to the contig IDs

## Raw sequence data

- Sequence data were deposited at NCBI with the accession code [SRA12345678](http://www.zju.edu.cn)
